document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2020-01
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERiCAN CANYON AUTHORIZING AN AMENDMENT TO THE CONTRACT BETWEEN THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AND THE BOARD OF ADMINISTRATION OF THE CALIFORNIA PUBLIC EMPLOYEE'S RETIREMENT SYSTEM THAT WILL IMPLEMENT COST SHARING PER THE NEGOTIATED CONTRACTS FOR ALL CLASSIC LOCAL MISCELLANEOUS MEMBERS IN THE TEAMSTERS LOCAL 315- GENERAL UNIT, TEAMSTERS LOCAL 315- MID-MANAGMENENT UNIT AND UNREPRESENTED COMPENSATION PROGRAM UNIT
